short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Highlights the name of the Google Scholar profile in all publications.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension highlights the name of the author in all publications to make it easier to spot contributions. Works for scholar.google.com .fr. .ch .de .at .ca .co.uk
